mapper.sql: SELECT idBIN , inicioRango , finRango , digitoValidacionChequeo , longitudNumeroCuenta , tokenIndicador , reservado1 , binProcesador , dominio , region , pais , largeTicket , technologyIndicator , ardefRegion , ardefPais , comercialCardLvl2DataIndicator , comercialCardLvl3EnhancedDataIndicator , comercialCardPOSPromptingIndicator , vatEvidence , originalCredit , accountLevelProcessingIndicator , originalCreditMoneyTransfer , originalCreditOnlineGambling , productID , comboCard , fastFunds , travelIndicator , r1r2r3 , accountFundingSource , settlementMatch , travelAccountData , accountRestrictedUse , nnssIndicator , productSubtype , reservado2 , testIndicator , reservado3 FROM VIE_MAN_RANGO_BIN_VISA
